Dialogs.Text: LostDecipher2: Did you also received an anonymous invitation?
ElChaparro05: Oh, you too! Seems i'm not alone in that one now. All the people here either 'discovered' this place or they had an old account.
LostDecipher2: I see, so everybody here had a way to access this place.
LostDecipher2: What did the invitation looked like?
ElChaparro05: Looked like? You know it isn't a post card, right?
LostDecipher2: I mean, it was just a link or there was a message?
ElChaparro05: Oh that! It was a private message on my bussiness email, saying it was somebody that wanted to talk something important with me.
ElChaparro05: And saying they wanted to talk here for privacy. Making themselves mysterious.
LostDecipher2: So... Some random user sends you a message to talk about 'something important' with a random link and you just... Accepted it?
ElChaparro05: The link didn't look malicious... And besides, what did i had to lose? It could've been a scoop! Or a great story for the channel!
Thomas B: (How did this guy didn't got his account hacked already?)
